title: Loan
description: Links the item with the patron and applies certain conditions based on policies

id.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the loan

userId.description: ID of the patron the item was lent to. Required for open loans, not required for closed loans (for anonymization).

borrower.description: Additional information about the borrower of the item, taken from the user referred to by the userId

barcode.description: barcode used to identify the borrower

preferredFirstName.description: preferred first name of the borrower

patronGroup.description: current patron group of the borrower

proxyUserId.description: ID of the user representing a proxy for the patron

itemId.description: ID of the item lent to the patron

loanPolicyId.description: ID of last policy used in relation to this loan

loanPolicy.description: Additional information about the loan policy of the item, taken from the loan loanPolicyId

name.description: Name of last policy used in relation to this loan

overdueFinePolicyId.description: ID of last overdue fine policy used in relation to this loan

overdueFinePolicy.description: Additional information about the overdue fine policy of the item, taken from the loan overdueFinePolicyId

name.description: Name of last overdue fine policy used in relation to this loan

lostItemPolicyId.description: ID of last lost item policy used in relation to this loan

lostItemPolicy.description: Additional information about the lost item policy of the item, taken from the loan lostItemPolicyId

name.description: Name of last lost item policy used in relation to this loan

title.description: The title of the item lent to the patron

callNumber.description: Deprecated call number from the holdings record, use callNumberComponents.callNumber instead

materialType.description: The material type from the item record

holdingsRecordId.description: The ID of the holdings for the item

instanceId.description: The ID of the instance for the item

location.description: The effective location of the item

date.description: Date time when status was last changed

inTransitDestinationServicePointId.description: Service point an item is intended to be transited to (should only be present when in transit)

inTransitDestinationServicePoint.description: Service point an item is intended to be transited to (should only be present when in transit)

id.description: The ID of the service point

callNumberComponents.description: Elements of a full call number

itemEffectiveLocationIdAtCheckOut.description: The effective location, at the time of checkout, of the item loaned to the patron.

name.description: Name of the status (currently can be any value, values commonly used are Open and Closed)

loanDate.description: Date and time when the loan began

dueDate.description: Date and time when the item is due to be returned

returnDate.description: Date and time when the item was returned

systemReturnDate.description: Date and time when return was processed

action.description: Last action performed on a loan (currently can be any value, values commonly used are checkedout and checkedin)

actionComment.description: Last action performed on a loan comments

renewalCount.description: Count of how many times a loan has been renewed (incremented by the client)

dueDateChangedByRecall.description: Is due date changed by recall request

dueDateChangedByNearExpireUser.description: Indicates whether or not this loan had its due date modified by a expired user

dueDateChangedByHold.description: Is due date changed by hold request

checkoutServicePointId.description: ID of the Service Point where the last checkout occured

checkinServicePointId.description: ID of the Service Point where the last checkin occured

checkoutServicePoint.description: Service Point where the last checkout occurred

checkinServicePoint.description: Service Point where the last checkin occurred

id.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the patron group

feesAndFines.description: Fees and fines associated with loans

amountRemainingToPay.description: Total remaining amount due on fees and fines for the loan

declaredLostDate.description: Date and time the item was declared lost during this loan

isDcb.description: Indicates whether or not this loan is associated for DCB use case

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to loan, provided by the server (client should not provide)
